rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0001
rows.name:
So Metsu's targeting the Iiran capital,
Aulrium...

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0002
rows.name: Adel, you must be worried sick.

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0003
rows.name: Yeah. I want to leave immediately.

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0004
rows.name:
But the capital, Aulrium,
is a long way off...

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0005
rows.name:
We have to cross Lett Bridge
and then the Dannagh Desert...

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0007
rows.name:
We'll need to get a good rest
and prepare properly before we leave.

rows.label: campfev11_380_170_msg0008
rows.name:
Right. We'll be fully prepared
and won't rush it.
